generic.invalidCommandName: ... you managed to send a different command than Discord told the server. How did you do that?
generic.errorExecutingCommand: There was am error executing your command. Please check your input or try again.

menu.description: Fetches the menu for a specific day.

overmorrow.name: overmorrow
overmorrow.description: Fetch the menu for the day after tomorrow

menu.noMenuProvider: It seems like the menu bot is not properly configured as no menu providers were found. Please contact the bot administrator.

response.error: There was an issue fetching the menu.

settingsmenu.baseDescription: Allows for configuring the menu bot.

setprovider.name: provider
setprovider.description: Change what menu provider you want to use

provider.description: The provider to use for fetching the menu

addTime.description: When fetching, adds this time in minutes to the current time to find the day to fetch the menu for.

time.description: Fetches the current time as UTC timestamp in HH:MM:SS.

unknownSubcommand.description: Unknown subcommand... I don't know what to do!

setprovider.success: Successfully set the menu provider to **{0}**.
setprovider.providerNotAvailable: Provider **{0}** does not exist. Please use the 'listproviders' command to see all available providers.

listproviders.success: Here are all available menu providers:
listproviders.noProviders: No menu providers available. Please contact the bot administrator.

periodicMenu.success: Successfully scheduled menu fetching at **{0}** using provider **{1}**. To find the day to fetch the menu for, {2} minutes will be added to the current UTC-time.
periodicMenu.noPermission: You do not have permission to configure periodic menu fetching.
periodicMenu.invalidTime: Invalid time format. Please use HH:MM:SS in UTC.
periodicMenu.noMenuForToday: No menu items found for **{0}** for **{1}**.
